com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

接口 TcrSession


  • public interface TcrSession
    The current session object for interaction with the cloud instance Note: This object must be used after the `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)` callback of `init(AsyncCallback)`.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      DataChannel createDataChannel(int port, DataChannelListener listener)
      Create a data channel.
      void enableLocalVideo(boolean enable)
      Enable/Disable the camera.
      void enableMic(boolean enable)
      Enable/Disable the mic.
      GamePad getGamePad()
      Get the object interacting with the cloud controller.
      Keyboard getKeyBoard()
      Get the object interacting with the cloud keyboard.
      Mouse getMouse()
      Get the object interacting with the cloud mouse.
      MultiUserManager getMultiUserManager()
      Get the multiplayer interactive cloud game manager.
      DeviceMode getRemoteDeviceMode()
      Return the cloud device type.

      Initialize the current session object.
      void mobileCmdPointer(boolean enable)
      Enable/Disable displaying the coordinates of the cloud phone touch cursor.

      Copy the text to the input box in the cloud application.

      Pause the media stream transfer.

      Terminate the session, disconnect the SDK from the cloud instance, and release the local resources of this session.

      Restart the cloud application process.

      Set the amplification factor of the volume level.

      Start a session, initiate a connection from the SDK to the cloud instance, and receive and render the cloud image.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setListener

        void setListener(TcrSessionListener listener)
        Set the session listener.
        参数:
        listener - The session listener.

      • init

        void init(AsyncCallback<java.lang.String> callback)
        Initialize the current session object. This function can be called only once for each session. If it is called repeatedly, only the first call will take effect.
        参数:
        callback - The callback of the initialization result of the session
        The `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)` callback will be triggered if the initialization succeeds, and the returned result will be used for `ClientSession` of the server request.
        The `AsyncCallback.onFailure(int, String)` callback will be triggered if the initialization fails.

      • start

        void start(java.lang.String serverSession,
           AsyncCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Start a session, initiate a connection from the SDK to the cloud instance, and receive and render the cloud image.
        参数:
        serverSession - The session returned after the business backend calls the Real-Time Cloud Rendering backend API `createSession(clientSession)`
        callback - The async result callback of this method:
        This session object can be further used only after the session is started successfully and `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)` is called back.
        `AsyncCallback.onFailure(int, String)` will be called back if the session fails to be started. If this error is called back, check whether `serverSession` is correct.

      • release

        void release()
        Terminate the session, disconnect the SDK from the cloud instance, and release the local resources of this session. Once terminated, a session cannot be used, and you need to create a session if connection is required.

      • setRenderView

        void setRenderView(TcrRenderView renderView)
        Set the rendering view. Set the rendering view of the session. The SDK will render the cloud image to the view.
        参数:
        renderView - The rendering view for video image rendering
        You can pass in `null` to remove the rendering view of the current session.

      • pauseStreaming

        void pauseStreaming()
        Pause the media stream transfer. Pause the transfer of media stream from the cloud to the client.

      • resumeStreaming

        void resumeStreaming()
        Resume the media stream transfer. Resume the transfer of media stream from the cloud to the client.

      • setStreamProfile

        void setStreamProfile(int fps,
                      int minBitrate,
                      int maxBitrate,
                      AsyncCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Set the frame rate and bitrates of the current video stream. The frame rate and bitrate will be dynamically adjusted in the cloud based on these settings and the network conditions.
        参数:
        fps - The frame rate. Value range: [10,60]. Default value: `60`.
        minBitrate - The minimum bitrate in Kbps. Value range: [1000,15000]. Default value: `1000`.
        maxBitrate - The maximum bitrate in Kbps. Value range: [1000,15000]. Default value: `15000`.
        callback - The callback for the call result
        `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)` will be called back if the success parameter is sent to the cloud server. However, the eventual setting effect of this API is subject to the cloud settings. The value set in the SDK can take effect only if it doesn't exceed the upper limit configured in the cloud.
        `AsyncCallback.onFailure(int, String)` will be called back if the API call times out. The error code is `TcrErrorCode.ERR_TIMEOUT`.

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float value)
        Set the amplification factor of the volume level. Set the PCM gain value of the audio, which is `1.0` by default.
        参数:
        value - A float number in the range of [0,10]. If it is greater than 1, it may cause sound distortion.

      • enableMic

        void enableMic(boolean enable)
        Enable/Disable the mic. If `true` is passed in, enable the mic. If `false` is passed in, disable the mic. The mic is disabled by default.
        参数:
        enable - Valid values: `true`: Enable; `false`: Disable.

      • enableLocalVideo

        void enableLocalVideo(boolean enable)
        Enable/Disable the camera. If `true` is passed in, enable the camera. If `false` is passed in, disable the camera. The camera is disabled by default.
        参数:
        enable - Valid values: `true`: Enable; `false`: Disable.

      • setLocalVideoBitrate

        void setLocalVideoBitrate(int videoBitrate)
        Set Local Video(Camera) upstream bitrate
        参数:
        videoBitrate - bitrate，unit kbps，default 1500kbps

      • setLocalVideoFps

        void setLocalVideoFps(int fps)
        Set Local Video(Camera) upstream fps
        参数:
        fps - frame rate，default 30

      • restartCloudApp

        void restartCloudApp()
        Restart the cloud application process.

      • pasteText

        void pasteText(java.lang.String text)
        Copy the text to the input box in the cloud application. The input box of the cloud application must have obtained the focus and allow the user to paste text from the clipboard.
        参数:
        text - The text to be pasted

      • setRemoteDesktopResolution

        void setRemoteDesktopResolution(int width,
                                int height)
        Set the resolution of Cloud Desktop. If the cloud PC application is in full-screen mode, the resolution of the downstream video stream will also change accordingly. This method is currently only valid for scenarios where the cloud is a PC application, and the scenario where the cloud is a mobile application is to be supported.
        参数:
        width - Width of cloud desktop.
        height - Height of cloud desktop.

      • getMultiUserManager

        MultiUserManager getMultiUserManager()
        Get the multiplayer interactive cloud game manager. It is used to call multiplayer interactive cloud game APIs.
        返回:
        The multiplayer interactive cloud game manager

      • getKeyBoard

        Keyboard getKeyBoard()
        Get the object interacting with the cloud keyboard.
        返回:
        The object interacting with the cloud keyboard

      • getMouse

        Mouse getMouse()
        Get the object interacting with the cloud mouse.
        返回:
        The object interacting with the cloud mouse

      • getGamePad

        GamePad getGamePad()
        Get the object interacting with the cloud controller.
        返回:
        The object interacting with the cloud controller

      • createDataChannel

        DataChannel createDataChannel(int port,
                              DataChannelListener listener)
        Create a data channel. Create a data channel for connecting the client to the cloud. The client can send any data stream to the cloud port through this channel, and the cloud application listens for the port to receive and process the data sent by the client. For more information, see the `DataChannel.send(ByteBuffer)` method.
        参数:
        port - The cloud port number uniquely identifying the data channel
        listener - The data channel listener, which is used to call back the connection status and data of the data channel.
        返回:
        DataChannel The data channel API

      • getRemoteDeviceMode

        DeviceMode getRemoteDeviceMode()
        Return the cloud device type. Note: This result can take effect only after the `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)` callback of `start(String, AsyncCallback)`.
        返回:
        The cloud device type `DeviceMode`

      • mobileCmdPointer

        void mobileCmdPointer(boolean enable)
        Enable/Disable displaying the coordinates of the cloud phone touch cursor. Note: Only the mobile game solution supports this feature.
        参数:
        enable - Valid values: `true`: Enable; `false`: Disable.
